sense.def:
The public
so ljudje na splošno.

seg.quote: All members of the public are welcome.
The gardens are open to the public.

sense.def:
Izraz
public
uporabljamo za stvari, ki se nanašajo na vse ljudi v državi ali skupnosti.

seg.quote: The politicians have to respond to public opinion.
These fumes are a hazard to public health.

sense.def:
Denar, ki je
public
, porabi vlada, da zagotovi storitve državljanom.

seg.quote: The government is reducing public spending.

sense.def:
Stavbe in storitve, ki so
public
, so na voljo vsem državljanom.

seg.quote: Both of these books can be obtained from the Public Library.

sense.def:
Kadar je oseba
public
ali
in public life
, jo pozna veliko ljudi, ker se pogosto pojavlja v javnem življenju.

seg.quote: Well-known people from all sections of public life gave the scheme their support.

sense.def:
Izjave, dejanja in dogodki, ki so
public
, potekajo tako, da jih lahko vsak vidi ali ve zanje.

seg.quote: No public announcement had yet been made.
I am going to say what I think of him openly and publicly.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj rečemo ali naredimo
in public
, to storimo v navzočnosti skupine drugih.

seg.quote: He repeated in public what he had said in private.

sense.def:
Kadar dejstvo
is made public
, ga ne prikrivamo, ampak o njem obvestimo javnost.

seg.quote: The cause of death was not made public.

sense.def:
V kraj, ki je
public
, lahko vsakdo neovirano pride in ga ljudje lahko vidijo in slišijo.

seg.quote: This is a very public place. Can we talk somewhere else?
